Text: This thing is amazing. I was floored this morning when I read about it. Fantastic work team C+D.
U need another PSP but not custom firmaware on it
That's a negative, trakko_man. This does require a working PSP with either a custom firmware, or original version 1.5 to set it up. It also has some steps to be done on the PC.

Some unsung geniuses has come up with a work around. It now does not require a working psp. Just one battery, "the files" however it involves sodering which isnt for everyone, as well a memory stick reader(in which you can copy files to it). I can guarentee its 100% working!!!!

I was back up in no time and stoked playing my games and watching my tv shows and my dvds again this is some sweet reverse engineering! 

***************************************
Thanks to all who put effort into creating this service tool!

sweet-leaf update ur firmware to any that is higher than 3.80 then do the network update on the psp itself this will automatically give u the newest software all games will work if ever u have trouble again just do the network update again 

dark alex rules i love the fact that he has made it possible to do a normal network update as if its not hacked and it will install the latest cfw
